comment._content: Did you know that women's boxing was a demonstration sport at the 1904 Olympics in St. Louis? Here is link to photo of a women's boxing match in 1904 from the official website of the Beijing 2008 Olympic Games

comment._content: A vaudeville act. See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2989424855/ for a picture of them wrestling.
